Name: PROTESTER
Text: Did you just motorsaw that guy to death?

Name: PROTESTER
Text: We cannot condone this kinda violent behaviour

Name: PROTESTER
Text: but this might stop the logging for a while.

Name: PROTESTER
Text: So eh, I think I should say 'thank you'?

Name: PROTESTER
Text: Anyway, you better leave now. I'm calling the cops!
